description: The article "Foam Party" explores the concept of internet fragmentation through Peter Sloterdijk's metaphor of 'foam'. It reframes the perceived splintering of the internet as a positive multiplicity rather than a loss of unity. The piece discusses filter bubbles, their historical context, and proposes embracing the foam metaphor to navigate digital spaces with awareness and empathy.
